root.name: MySims SkyHeroes
root.description: SkyHeroes is a air combat game, in which your MySim takes flight against the evil Morcubus and his army. As you fight, your character's fame will increase, as will the customization options for your plane. Unlockable charactersIsaac Tyson To play as Tyson from Army of Two series and Isaac from the Dead space series enter code: LB LB LB RB RB RB LB RB
